name: SC Johnson
goal: SC Johnson is a global manufacturer and marketer of household consumer goods based in Racine, Wisconsin, USA. It markets its products throughout the EU and maintains manufacturing operations in the Netherlands, Poland and the United Kingdom.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Environment, Public Health, Taxation
euInitiatives: Consumer Affairs, Environment, Sustainability, CLP Regulation, Biocidal Products Regulation, REACH
